summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PRODIGY AI modal overlay fix. Backend APIs remain 100% functional. Frontend modal overlay fix is working well - navigation is fully functional after class creation with 100% success rate.

ui_bugs.issue: Role selection inconsistency - sometimes creates student account when teacher is selected
ui_bugs.impact: Users may get wrong account type, but workaround exists
ui_bugs.reproduction: Select teacher role in signup, sometimes still creates student account

design_issues.issue: Sidebar has high z-index (50) but doesn't block navigation
design_issues.note: Not blocking functionality, just detected in overlay analysis

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (100% success rate - 19/19 tests)
Backend AI chat, file upload, notifications, calendar, leaderboard
Frontend navigation after class creation (100% success - 4/4 tests)
Frontend responsive design and UI rendering
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Role selection in signup form occasionally creates student account when teacher is selected. This doesn't affect the modal overlay fix but should be investigated for consistency. The main modal overlay issue has been successfully resolved.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (modal overlay fix working, minor role selection issue)
